msg.msgText: The composite configuration objects that control messaging services, such as MessageHub, Endpoint, Queue etc., can be created using the "imaserver create" command. SYNTAX: imaserver create help imaserver create object_type help imaserver create object_type "Name=value" "Item=value" ... EXAMPLE: imaserver create MessageHub "Name=TestHub" "Description=Test Message hub"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
